title: Kirby Model 510 Owners Manual from 1950
content:
1. Information such as the country: USA  
2. Age of the sample 1950  
3. I am trying to reproduce the old manual and would like to know the fonts used so I can re-create the manual to be as close to the original one as possible.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171428im_/http:/typophile.com/files/510_Font_Test_5903.jpg)

Font: 

 Furura & Bookman 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171428/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")
author: mbpb45

comments.content:
Futura Bold Condensed for the heads:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/futura-bq/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171428/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/futura-bq/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/futura-bq/")

Bookman, again, for the text:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/bookman-old-style/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171428/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/bookman-old-style/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/bookman-old-style/")
